```{r , include=FALSE}
pone=function(n,k,strategy,nreps){
  if(strategy==1){
    boxes=1:(2*n)
    card=sample(2*n,2*n)
    successes=0
    for (i in 1:nreps){
      card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      attempt=1
      card_num=card[k]
      while(attempt<n)
        {
         attempt=attempt+1
        if (card_num==k){
         successes=successes+1
         break}
        else
          card_num=card[card_num]
        }
    
    }
      prob=successes/nreps
      return(prob)
    
  }
  if(strategy==2){
    k_2=sample(2*n,1)
    boxes=1:(2*n)
    successes=0
     for (i in 1:nreps){
       card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      attempt=1
      card_num=card[k_2]
      while(attempt<n)
        {
         attempt=attempt+1
        if (card_num==k_2){
         successes=successes+1
         break}
        else
          card_num=card[card_num]
        }
    
    }
    prob=successes/nreps
    return(prob)
    
 }
  if(strategy==3){
    boxes=1:(2*n)
    successes=0
     for (i in 1:nreps){
      k_3=sample(2*n,1)
      card=sample(2*n,2*n)
      boxes=sample(2*n,n)
      if(any(boxes==k_3)==TRUE)
        successes=successes+1
    }
    prob=successes/nreps
    return(prob)
    
  }
}
```

```{r}
core_while=function(n,attempt,p,cards)
  {
    success=0
   if (attempt==0)
   {
     card_num=sample(cards,1)
     attempt=1
   }
   if (attempt==1)
   {
     card_num=cards[p]
   }
    while(attempt<n)
    {
     
      if(card_num==p)
      {
        success=1
        break;
      }
      else
      {
        card_num=cards[card_num]
      }
      attempt=attempt+1
    }
    return(success)
}
```

```{r 2}
pall=function(n,strategy,nreps)
  {
  prisoners=1:(2*n)
  all_released=nreps
  if(strategy==1){
    for (i in 1:nreps){
      cards=sample(1:(2*n),2*n)
      for (prisoner in prisoners)
      {
        if(core_while(n,1,prisoner,cards)==0)
        {
          all_released=all_released-1
          break
        }
      }
    }
    return(all_released/nreps)
  }
  if(strategy==2){
    for (i in 1:nreps)
    {
      cards=sample(1:(2*n),2*n)
      for (prisoner in prisoners)
      {
        if(core_while(n,0,prisoner,cards)==0)
        {
          all_released=all_released-1
          break;
        }
      }
    }
    return(all_released/nreps)
    
  }
  if (strategy==3)
  {
    for (i in 1:nreps)
    {
      cards=sample(1:(2*n),2*n)
      for (prisoner in prisoners)
      {
        unbox=sample(1:(2*n),n)
        if (any(unbox==prisoner)==FALSE)
        {
          all_released=all_released-1
          break;
        }
      }
    }
    return(all_released/nreps)
  }
}
```

## 5 dloop
```{r ,echo=FALSE}
dloop=function(n,nreps)
{
  boxes=1:(2*n)
  occurence=rep(0,2*n)
  for (i in 1:nreps)
  {
    occurence_time=rep(0,2*n) 
    cards=sample(boxes,2*n)
     depth=1
     u=cards
     permutation_matrix=cards
     while(depth<2*n)
     {
      u=cards[u]
      permutation_matrix=rbind(permutation_matrix,u)
      depth=depth+1
     }
     for (box in boxes)
     {
       occurence_time[which(permutation_matrix[,box]==box)[1]]=1
     }
    occurence=occurence+occurence_time
  }
  probs=occurence/nreps
  return(probs)
}
```

```{r}
dloop.check=function(n,nreps)
{
  boxes=1:(2*n)
  less_50=0
  for (i in 1:nreps)
  {
     cards=sample(boxes,2*n)
     depth_measure=rep(0,2*n)
     depth=1
     u=cards
     permutation_matrix=cards
     while(depth<2*n)
     {
      u=cards[u]
      permutation_matrix=rbind(permutation_matrix,u)
      depth=depth+1
     }
     for (box in boxes)
     {
      depth_measure[which(permutation_matrix[,box]==box)[1]]=1
     }
      if (any(depth_measure[(n+1):(2*n)]==1)==FALSE)
      {
        less_50=less_50+1
      }
    }
  return(less_50/nreps)
}
```
